bread-and-butter.translation[0].definiti: bread-and-butter questions are very important basic ones
bread-and-butter political issues such as jobs and housing
bread-and-butter work is work that is not very exciting but provides you with most of the money that you need in order to live
bread-and-butter.translation[1].definiti: if something is your bread and butter, it is the thing that gives you your main income
